item.title: The True Way of Life and Salvation
item.description:
The True Way of Life and Salvation by President Spencer W. Kimball, President of the Church given in the Saturday Morning session of the 148th Annual General Conference on Fri Mar 31 1978
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone.
